Publish.LongDescription:
# CS2MapView.Exporter beta
This mod only outputs files for CS2MapView viewer application. Unlike [CSLMapView](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=845665815 "CSLMapView"), the viewer is not shipped with the mod. Please get viewer application (cs2mapview.exe) from [github](https://github.com/gansaku/CS2MapView/ "github").
## Viewer Installation * Requirements * Windows 64bit * [.NET 8 Desktop Runtime](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download/dotnet/8.0 ".NET 8 Desktop Runtime") * Download [cs2mapview_x.x.x.zip](https://github.com/gansaku/CS2MapView/releases) and unzip it to anywhere you like.
## Usage ### Export map data * (In game) Option -> CS2MAPVIEW -> Export ### Viewer Operation * Not implemented to launch the viewer directly from the game, so launch the cs2mapview.exe directly. * Mouse Wheel : zoom * Ctrl + Wheel : rotate * Left Drag : map scroll
